name: Printable Clever Tags for Gifts of Food E-Kit
description:
I've gathered up some of my most used quotes that I like to use when making gift tags for my food presents, and put them all in a simple to use e-kit, sent right to your email in-box!

Included in this kit are seven templates for you to save to your computer and use over and over again. Each template comes on it's own pdf. template with ten identical labels per page for you to print, right from your own computer. Any of these templates can be printed on card stock, computer or scrapbook paper, or even on old dictionary or book pages.

A creative gift tag is the crowning glory, adding a charming touch to a hostess gift, or holiday treat basket....Think of the delightful details you can add to any gift of food, at holidays...or any time!

Templates include tag templates that read:
*A balanced diet is a cookie in each hand*
*Life is short, eat dessert first*
*Happy Birthday!
*Thank You!*
*Eat drink and be scary* (So perfect for Halloween!)
*One of the secrets of a happy life is continuous small treats*
*Be sure to celebrate the many small things...bright days, good friends, and anything with sprinkles.(A great lil' tag to add to any baked good...cupcakes, cookies, cakes... with sprinkles!)*
This kit includes all seven templates to make the tags pictured and listed above...simply print them, cut them out with scissors or pinking shears, punch a hoe to add a ribbon, and feel free to use the templates as you wish, over and over again!

name: Printable Bunko Party E-Kit
description:
This kit arrives in your inbox and includes all of the patterns, templates and complete instructions for 4 easy and fun projects:

Bunko Banner
Bunko Cupcake Flags
Decorative Bunko Flags
Bunko Score Cards

Instructions and patterns to create your very own banner to
decorate for your Bunko party, as well as little decorative flags, and cupcake flags too!

name: Coordinating A Successful Vintage Faire E-Kit
description:
All the information you need to coordinate your very own Vintage style Fair, start to fabulous finish, and it arrives right in your email in-box! 

Kit topics include:
• So, you want to host a Vintage Faire…now what?

• What’s in a name?

• Location, location, location!

• To eat, or not to eat?

• Crunching the numbers: math errors can cost you money

• Who, when, what, where, how… Stay on track!

• Permits, Insurance- Not fun, but oh, so necessary

• Gathering Vendors

• Getting the Word Out…Gorilla marketing!

• It’s all in the details

• Taking care of your vendors and covering your buns

• The Big Day

And to complete the kit:
The following documents are separated out
to make things easier to file and organize
your faire:

• Creating and assembling your Press Kit

• Complete Vendor Kit with Application

• Vendor Welcome Kit for the event

name: Printable Get Well e-kit
description:
Gather up some basic remedies to help someone who's feeling under the weather, and make it extra special by packaging it creatively!

Easy to print and assemble tags, and labels that arrive in your inbox, and will make a get well package that's just what the doctor ordered. 

And the best part? You can print it over and over again!

name: Printable Small, Medium, and Large B L I S S Banners
description:
Instant gratification. 

No waiting at the mailbox days or weeks for a little box to arrive. Your printable e-kit will arrive in your email in-box within 24 hours (usually much sooner!) and you're ready to start creating your own banners!

I have created a kit complete with three sizes for making your very own BLISS Banners, with charming sage green lettering and vintage urns brimming with flowers in corals,
pinks, browns and greens. Of course, these
templates can be printed on any color paper, and
used as many times as you like! The new kits are
now available and will arrive in your email inbox, so
no waiting by the mailbox!
Included in this kit are instructions and templates for
creating your very own BLISS Banner, in a nice large
size (Over five feet wide when complete!), a medium
size ( About four feet wide) and the small square banner, perfect for tucking into a card, or stringing across a computer monitor....so many places!
B L I S S Banners

Kit includes:

LARGE B L I S S Banner
Over five feet of hanging flags to thread on a
ribbon...

MEDIUM B L I S S Banner
Nearly three feet of hanging flags to thread on
a ribbon..

And, last but not least, the sweetest little itty-bitty banner, perfect for swagging on a mirror, or for tucking inside a card as a
little unexpected gift! Instructions are included to walk you through assembling your banner, and
the templates may be saved to your computer and use over and over again.

Think of the delightful details you can add to any room or event!
